D

Device - Class in com.flir.flironesdk
Represents a connected FLIR ONE device, including the methods for interacting and capturing images and videos from it.

Device.TuningState - Enum in com.flir.flironesdk

E

emissivity() - Method in class com.flir.flironesdk.RenderedImage
Emissivity relates to how reflective a material is.
EMISSIVITY_GLOSSY - Static variable in class com.flir.flironesdk.FrameProcessor
Glossy emissivity is for reading temperatures of materials such as steel
EMISSIVITY_MATTE - Static variable in class com.flir.flironesdk.FrameProcessor
Matte is the default emissivity and is useful for reading temperatures of skin, wood, and most other household items.
EMISSIVITY_SEMI_GLOSSY - Static variable in class com.flir.flironesdk.FrameProcessor
Semi-glossy is for reading temperatures of semi-reflective materials
EMISSIVITY_SEMI_MATTE - Static variable in class com.flir.flironesdk.FrameProcessor
 

F

Frame - Class in com.flir.flironesdk
Represents a raw frame received from the camera that can be rendered into a colorized, MSX, or visible-only image with a FrameProcessor instance.
Frame(File) - Constructor for class com.flir.flironesdk.Frame
 
FrameProcessor - Class in com.flir.flironesdk
This class converts from Frame to RenderedImage Processing includes colorizing, MSX fusion, and temperature-accurate thermography.
FrameProcessor(Context, FrameProcessor.Delegate, Set<RenderedImage.ImageType>) - Constructor for class com.flir.flironesdk.FrameProcessor
Create a frame processor to convert thermal frames to images that can be displayed.
FrameProcessor.Delegate - Interface in com.flir.flironesdk
Defines callback for frame processing results

getProcessedFrames(Frame) - Method in class com.flir.flironesdk.FrameProcessor

Call this method to connect to a FLIR One device, typically you should call this from your activity's onResume method, passing your app context and device delegate.

Call this method during onStop to stop listening for devices connected over USB.
stopFrameStream() - Method in class com.flir.flironesdk.Device
Call this method to stop frame streaming This method will have no effect if called if frames are not streaming
